concept.title: Unescape URL Value: oxy_unescapeURLValue(string) Function
concept.shortdesc: This function returns the unescaped value of a URL-like string given as a parameter.

conbody.p: For example, if the value contains %20 it will be converted to a simple space character.
oxy_unescapeURLValue("http://www.example.com/a%20simple%20example.html") returns the following value:http://www.example.com/a simple example.html
